remarks: Rolle's theorem.  If ` F ` is a real continuous function on ` [ A , B ] ` which is differentiable on ` ( A , B ) ` , and ` F ( A ) = F ( B ) ` , then there is some ` x e. ( A , B ) ` such that ` ( RR _D F ) `` x = 0 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)
